bibl.title: Allegoresis and Alcman's "Cosmogony": P. Oxy. XXIV 2390 (fr. 5 Page-Davies).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXIV, 2390 (= Pack2 82). - Alcman fr. 5: Poem and Commentary. - Allegoresis and Poetry. - The Alcman Commentator: In His Own Words? - The Craft of Cosmogony. - Thetis in the Forge: Gods and Anvils. - An Aristotelian Vocabulary? - A Few Conclusions.
STEINER Charlotte J., Allegoresis and Alcman's "Cosmogony": P. Oxy. XXIV 2390 (fr. 5 Page-Davies).
